simpledb

Class BPlusTreeHeaderPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.BPlusTreeHeaderPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Page

    public class BPlusTreeHeaderPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Page
    Each instance of BPlusTreeHeaderPage stores data for one page of a BPlusTreeFile and implements the Page interface that is used by BufferPool.
    See Also:
    BPlusTreeFile, BufferPool

    • Constructor Detail

      • BPlusTreeHeaderPage

        public BPlusTreeHeaderPage(BPlusTreePageId id,
                   byte[] data)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a BPlusTreeHeaderPage from a set of bytes of data read from disk. The format of a BPlusTreeHeaderPage is two pointers to the next and previous header pages, followed by a set of bytes indicating which pages in the file are used or available
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        BufferPool.getPageSize()

        Initially mark all slots in the header used.

      • getId

        public BPlusTreePageId getId()
        Description copied from interface: Page
        Return the id of this page. The id is a unique identifier for a page that can be used to look up the page on disk or determine if the page is resident in the buffer pool.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Page
        Returns:
        the PageId associated with this page.

      • getPageData

        public byte[] getPageData()
        Generates a byte array representing the contents of this page. Used to serialize this page to disk.

        The invariant here is that it should be possible to pass the byte array generated by getPageData to the BPlusTreeHeaderPage constructor and have it produce an identical BPlusTreeHeaderPage object.

        Specified by:
        getPageData in interface Page
        Returns:
        A byte array correspond to the bytes of this page.
        See Also:
        BPlusTreeHeaderPage(simpledb.BPlusTreePageId, byte[])

      • createEmptyPageData

        public static byte[] createEmptyPageData()
        Static method to generate a byte array corresponding to an empty BPlusTreeHeaderPage. Used to add new, empty pages to the file. Passing the results of this method to the BPlusTreeHeaderPage constructor will create a BPlusTreeHeaderPage with no valid data in it.
        Returns:
        The returned ByteArray.
